about_us.title: About Us Remalux
about_us.description: K-COLOR LLP with the brand name 'REMALUX' offers high European quality at an affordable price. K-COLOR LLP with the brand name 'REMALUX' is a leader in the production of paints and varnishes, located in the Republic of Kazakhstan. We offer consumers a wide range of top-quality paints, manufactured under a British license from raw materials from renowned French, Belgian, German, Dutch, and American producers.
